text: Hi kids!

Yes it's me bob..
Join me for learning street with bob..
Without A an ARROW will just be a ROW

But there always be a A don't you fret
A A A we loves Mr. A
A A A Amazing all the way...
A A A he lead the alphabets and there always be a A don't you fret.
Would you like to hear one more time kids great..
Let's sing it again

So kids I hope you had awesome time today learning all about letter A
